Fantastically well done for an indie zombie shooter. More brutal than Left 4 Dead in my opinion - the closed-environment, wave based gameplay really gives you the feeling of fighting for your life.

Co-op play is great, the biggest reason to get this game.

Squad based zombie shooter. It's not the same as Left 4 Dead. Rather than trying to make your way through an area, you pick a spot to hold out and fight. Enemies will spawn depending upon your position. There is a great variety of weapons, including liquid-based flamethrowers and crossbows in addition to the conventional stuff in every FPS. Each weapon belongs to a class that can improve upon the weapon skill by doing damage with the weapon, although cross-class weapon usage is possible. The combat is tense, as you can never be sure what will pop up next. But the real reason to play this game is to insult zombies and throw your dosh around for the hilariously snarky comments by the two voice actors that voice the characters.
BUY THIS GAME! IT"S AWESOME!! :P
Muito foda! Se você não quer acumular mais um vício na tua vida, FIQUE LONGE DESTE JOGO. XD
LOADSAMONEEEEEEY!
THIS. GAME. KICKS. ASS{ PLEASE. EXCUSE. MY. LANGUAGE.}

This game is fun, it has its weak points but what doesnt? I would recomend it because of its streamline gameplay and coop oriented style, coupled with a large amount of weapons, you can either choose to support your team or doll out the pain!
This game is so much fun with a group of people you know. Played it hours and hours and will keep playing it! Definately check it out!

Also, best game straight down the FPS genre. Who needs storylines, 'amazing' graphics and too many 'features' bogging you down when you can easily have a load of zombies to kill with lots of big guns instead?
Played it a few times. Its ok.

As a FPS fanatic I like to play good shooters that are fun and challenging. This game offers both. It's sort of a mix between Nazi Zombies and Left 4 Dead on the unreal engine. You basically hold off waves of various Zed types that want to rip you apart and then fight the big boss called the Patriarch. As a good game should, it has gotten a lot of free additional content (new weapons, maps, etc.) over time and has not let down in it's quality. With 7 levelable perks to choose from for your gameplay helps the game to become even more addicting. 18 euros for a cool and decent looking (graphically) survival shooter isn't too bad in my opinion. Whereas this game may not fulfill the needs of a hardcore gamer, it's a must have for zombie slaying addicts.

頭を破裂させるのが非常に楽しいゲーム。
L4Dと違ってCo-opを強制しないので基本的にフリーダム。

Чувствуете себя уставшим после работы?.. Ха! Значит пришло время отдохнуть от серой обыденности и погрузиться в мир ужаса и хаоса, да размозжить пару сотен голов жалким генетическим уродам! Задорный саундтрек, богатый оружейный арсенал, элементы прокачки персонажей - всё это для того, чтобы вы не заскучали...
Einfach nur hamma =D

pros - price perks are a major plus to the game good graphics and not to demanding of a good system an okay assortment  of enemies for the price

cons addictive and not to many weapons about a dozen or so leveling up takes a while

If you think COD Zombies is fun, this game is on a different level.  Multiple classes with different roles, leveling system, huge waves of different types undead, elites, end boss fights, tons of ranked maps.  Best co-op experience I've ever had in a video game.  Nothing beats this for pure fun.
Epic game for any level of gamer
*Gyrates*
Just too fun game. Worthy it's money.

Hervorragender Horror-Survival-Shooter, der enorm Laune macht. Teamplay ist im Coop unumgänglich, um am Ende nach dem finalen Bosskampfes erfolgreich, d.h. lebendig vom Schlachtfeld zu gehen. Das Spiel hat eine gute Atmosphäre und sorgt des Öfteren für Schockmomente, wozu auch die gut designten Maps beitragen.
Durch das Abschlachten böswilliger Kreaturen erhält man Geld, welches man am Ende jeder Runde (eine Map hat mehrere Runden, die es zu überstehen gilt) in neue Waffen, Muniton usw. eingetauscht werden kann. Hierbei gibt es eine Vielzahl zur Auswahl. Darüber hinaus kann man zwischen verschiedenen Klassen wählen, wie einem Nahkämpfer, Bombenleger etc., welche dann mit entsprechenden Waffen gemäß ihrer Klasse für mehr Schaden sorgen oder andere Verbesserungen mit sich bringen.
PS: Unbedingt die ungeschnitte Version organisieren und nicht auf Deutsch spielen, da sonst trotzdem alles geschnitten ist!
a matar muchos zombies!!

Easily the best team-based co-op game I've played. It's pure survival, and that equals hours of fun.

This game is actually amazing. At first it seems like a rip off of L4D, but once you get going, you realise it's basically what 28 Days Later did for the zombie movie genre! 

TL;DR version = British Left 4 Dead!
If you like undead, human lab rat experimentations gone horrible wrong, and first person shooters, than you'll love KF. it's got all that mashed together with a crazy British twist.

The single most enjoyable wave game ive ever played. this shit rocked my world and shit im my bed, it then made my bed and cleaned up the shit because i bought this game, if you even kind of like wave defence games, or slightly enjoy zombie games buy this, or you will have shit in your bed and they WONT clean it up.

This game is so more win, I like it more then l4d (l4d1 that is, I hate l4d2), it's full of noobs however so it's better to find some friends who have some decent skill and common sense to play with and expand your friendlist with, I would give the game a 8/10, a point decrease because of the outdated graphics, although the graphics are awesome in their  own way, another point lost because updates are infrequent and almost non existent while there is enough to update and to fix, there is also the fact that a lot of people have problems like crashing or being unable to connect because the game uses so many ports.

So in short, good game, fantastic co-op fun, 8/10.

This game is rather fun. It does get repetitive with the feeling of a grind fest. There are a few perks, or classes you can play and you level each one up. You can level up one perk as you play a different one. For example you can level up demolition class but heal a team, thus increasing your experience towards your medic perk.

You start as a lvl 0 in each perk and the max is lvl 6. Come lvl 4, shit takes a long time to lvl. Based on my extensive playtime I imagine lvl 5 to lvl 6 takes about 10 hours of grind time? Not to mention the roughly 10 hours of play time it took to get to lvl 5.

So in total, it probably takes 100ish hours(?) to get all of your perks to lvl 6, and that is probably an underestimate.

Sorry to rant about the time it takes, but essentially the game is a grind fest.
HOWEVER it is fun. They have 5 difficulties from ranging from retard-proof to insanely  fucking hard. Most pub games are a fail, so it takes some friends to beat levels in the game. I recommend it.
The best co-op survival game ever! ^^

Great zombie survival game! Takes some time to learn how to play but when you do it's super amazing.
Leveling perks is slow but worth it.

Somehow, this game manages to stay addictive despite it's comparitively low-res graphics. This is just an example that proves gameplay is the most important factor in any game. Even if you team up with strangers, you're almost guaranteed to have fun (and possibly shit yourself scared.). However, it's pretty obvious that you'll have the most fun playing this game with your mates.

Scary, thrilling, fun and funny (thanks to the voice-acting), this is definitely one co-op game you don't want to leave unplayed. I'm glad to be able to play this game. Many thanks to my pal, Japzzi, for gifting me this game!

Incredibly fun to play, if you have friends to play with. Playing alone, or with random players can be frustrating. The game is all iron sights, no crosshairs unless the weapon has a scope on it. It takes some actual skill, and actual aim to play. Not recommended for spray and pray players.

襲ってくるゾンビを殲滅するCo-opFPS。略称はKF
「殲滅する」と一言に纏めましたが、実際にプレイしたらこれが中々面白い
AK47やDE・ショットガンなどの一般的な銃からグレネードランチャーなどの爆発物、果てはチェーンソーや火炎放射器などのキワモノ武器となんでもござれ
また、Perk(RPGでいう職業)が存在し、就くPerkによって得意武器も違ってきます
Co-opゲームであるので身勝手な単独行動は死に繋がります。仲間と協力しながらゾンビを倒しましょう！

4つの難易度があり、各難易度の各公式MAPにクリア実績が存在
実績解除を目標にプレイしていくのもこのゲームの楽しみの一つですね
KILLING FLOOR FTW. 'nuff said.

KF is a Hard Core Game that can be played solo or with others. It has 7 differint porfiles with levels ranging from 0 to the max level 6. though one can play with no stadagy. Its best played with others as a teem. To achieve all 132 achievemonts. Every one in game must work together to form a game plan. to get the best resalts. Form a defenceve/perrimider (line). secure doors(weld). lay pipe bombs as a secondery wall. Us the Commandos frunt line. Support specialist second line. Sharp shooter takeing out the scrakes fleshpound and sirons from a distance. Berserker floating around like a ninja. Firebug 3rd line of defence. with demolition laying cover fire with his granade luncher and pipe bombs. and last but not least. Field Medic healing every one when needed at the same time laying cover fire. the best part of this game is you get to kill zombies
I think Killing Floor is a pretty cool guy, eh kills zombies and doesnt afraid of anything
